attributes.additional_details: No one questions the danger of these drugs because they are Legal. Most people are uneducated and naive over the risks. How many more people need to have near death experiences or die before these drugs are off the market.
attributes.background: Last week my sisters best friend nearly died because of a legal high called 'Black mamba' she is 16 years of age and brought it from a shop.. No questions asked. Her heart stopped three times. Every week we hear a story about someone dying over these drugs.. Enough is enough.
